animeTitle: Hidan no Aria: Butei ga Kitarite Onsen Kenshuu
animeDescription: The story takes place in Tokyo Butei High School, a special school where armed detectives—"Butei"—are trained to use weapons. Kinji Tooyama is a second-year-student who has a special ability, but he keeps it a secret to maintain an ordinary, peaceful life; however, when he gets caught in a bombing on the way to school, he encounters H. Aria Kanzaki, the most powerful S-Rank Butei student in Assault Studies.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Kanzaki, Aria Holmes', 'Tooyama, Kinji', 'Mine, Riko', 'Hotogi, Shirayuki', 'Reki', "d'Arc, Jeanne", 'Mutou, Gouki', 'Okami']
